alert.note: Alert for Northern Lycoming; Southern Lycoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 12:36AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LYCOMING COUNTY THROUGH 115 AM EDT... At 1236 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles north of Lock Haven to Jersey Shore to 11 miles west of Mifflinburg. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Williamsport, Montoursville, Montgomery, Duboistown, Elimsport, Cogan Station, Collomsville, English Center, Trout Run, Buttonwood, Loyalsockville, South Williamsport, Garden View, Williamsport Airport and Little League World Series Complex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
